goals__remit:
Institute for Sustainability offers research and consulting on sustainability management and corporate responsibility (CR/CSR). The focus is on strategies, organisational solutions, reporting, communication and various sustainability issues. 
 
Sound advice: Our clients profit from our expertise, knowledge and research skills. 
 
Practice oriented research: We can draw on our vast experience to enrich research projects and ensure that the results can be implemented directly in practice. 
Excellent cooperation partners. 
 
Committed to the cause: We are concerned with both our clients’ cause and sustainable development. Our work is designed to produce long-lasting effects.
relevant_communication:
Minimum requirements and the ceilings for the content of the non-financial declaration 
 
Interpretation of the new HGB rules on non-financial reporting from the perspective of management and sustainability reporting. Recommendations to companies and politicians.
